languages.text: "О мирах в Поясе Лангренна ходит немало слухов среди пилигримов. Есть те, кто уверяет, что некогда здесь бушевала великая битва между Империумом и врагами Человечества".

traits.locale_text: "О мирах в Поясе Лангренна ходит немало слухов среди пилигримов. Есть те, кто уверяет, что некогда здесь бушевала великая битва между Империумом и врагами Человечества".

languages.text: "There is no shortage of rumours among pilgrims about the worlds in Langrenn's Belt. Some attest that a great battle once raged here between the Imperium and the foes of Humanity."
languages.original_text: "О мирах в Поясе Лангренна ходит немало слухов среди пилигримов. Есть те, кто уверяет, что некогда здесь бушевала великая битва между Империумом и врагами Человечества".

traits.locale_text: "There is no shortage of rumours among pilgrims about the worlds in Langrenn's Belt. Some attest that a great battle once raged here between the Imperium and the foes of Humanity."
"There is no shortage of rumours among pilgrims about the worlds in Langrenn's Belt. Some attest that a great battle once raged here between the Imperium and the foes of Humanity."
"There is no shortage of rumours among pilgrims about the worlds in Langrenn's Belt. Some attest that a great battle once raged here between the Imperium and the foes of Humanity."
"There is no shortage of rumours among pilgrims about the worlds in Langrenn's Belt. Some attest that a great battle once raged here between the Imperium and the foes of Humanity."

languages.text: « Les pèlerins colportent quantité de rumeurs au sujet des mondes de la Ceinture de Langrenn. Certaines prétendent qu'une grande bataille opposant l'Imperium aux ennemis de l'humanité s'est jouée ici. »
languages.original_text: "There is no shortage of rumours among pilgrims about the worlds in Langrenn's Belt. Some attest that a great battle once raged here between the Imperium and the foes of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: « Les pèlerins colportent quantité de rumeurs au sujet des mondes de la Ceinture de Langrenn. Certaines prétendent qu'une grande bataille opposant l'Imperium aux ennemis de l'humanité s'est jouée ici. »

languages.text: “朝圣者中不乏关于朗恩之带那些世界的传言。有些人信誓旦旦地表示，帝国与人类之敌曾在此爆发过一场大战。”
languages.original_text: "There is no shortage of rumours among pilgrims about the worlds in Langrenn's Belt. Some attest that a great battle once raged here between the Imperium and the foes of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: “朝圣者中不乏关于朗恩之带那些世界的传言。有些人信誓旦旦地表示，帝国与人类之敌曾在此爆发过一场大战。”

languages.text: 「巡礼者の間では、ラングレンズベルトにある惑星についての噂に事欠かない。かつて、ここで帝国と人類の敵との間で大きな戦いが繰り広げられたという証言もある」
languages.original_text: "There is no shortage of rumours among pilgrims about the worlds in Langrenn's Belt. Some attest that a great battle once raged here between the Imperium and the foes of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: 「巡礼者の間では、ラングレンズベルトにある惑星についての噂に事欠かない。かつて、ここで帝国と人類の敵との間で大きな戦いが繰り広げられたという証言もある」

languages.text: "Unter Pilgern gibt es unzählige Gerüchte über die Welten in Langrenns Gürtel. Einige sagen, dass hier einst eine große Schlacht zwischen dem Imperium und den Feinden der Menschheit stattgefunden hat."
languages.original_text: "There is no shortage of rumours among pilgrims about the worlds in Langrenn's Belt. Some attest that a great battle once raged here between the Imperium and the foes of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: "Unter Pilgern gibt es unzählige Gerüchte über die Welten in Langrenns Gürtel. Einige sagen, dass hier einst eine große Schlacht zwischen dem Imperium und den Feinden der Menschheit stattgefunden hat."

languages.text: «Abundan los rumores sobre peregrinos en los mundos del Cinturón de Langrenn. Algunos testifican que aquí tuvo lugar una gran batalla entre el Imperium y los enemigos de la Humanidad».
languages.original_text: "There is no shortage of rumours among pilgrims about the worlds in Langrenn's Belt. Some attest that a great battle once raged here between the Imperium and the foes of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: «Abundan los rumores sobre peregrinos en los mundos del Cinturón de Langrenn. Algunos testifican que aquí tuvo lugar una gran batalla entre el Imperium y los enemigos de la Humanidad».

languages.text: "Langrenn Kuşağı'ndaki dünyalar konusunda hacılar arasında bitmek bilmeyen söylentiler dolaşıyor. Bazıları burada bir zamanlar İmparatorluk ile İnsanlığın düşmanları arasında büyük bir savaş yaşandığını iddia ediyor."
languages.original_text: "There is no shortage of rumours among pilgrims about the worlds in Langrenn's Belt. Some attest that a great battle once raged here between the Imperium and the foes of Humanity."
